Entries.Help: playMusic echos/pause 2000/speak Witch "Have you ever done something... $2 #$b# Something that you regret... $2"/speak Witch "Something that keeps you up at night."/faceDirection Witch 1/pause 2000/faceDirection Witch 3/speak Witch " I've been so angry lately. $2 #$b# Many years ago my life shattered. I was so mad... $2 #$b# I started cursing everything I saw. $2 #$b# I didn't know how to control my emotions.$2 #$b# I let them get the better of me and instead of trying to solve them they got the best of me."/speak Witch " I wish I could go back and undo what I did. $2 #$b# But it's too late now."/pause 2000/speak Witch " I'm going to get out of this rain. I must go investigate."/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/faceDirection Witch 0/faceDirection farmer 3/warp farmer 17 40 3/warp Witch 6 37 0/fade/viewport 15 35/move farmer -7 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Witch 1/jump Witch/emote Witch 16/speak Witch "Hello @. $2 #$b# You caught me at a bad time. $2"/speak Witch "I was finally going to talk with Rasmodius. #$b# Don't worry I'm not trying to provoke anything. #$b# I simply just wanted to let him know I'm sorry for lashing out at him all those years ago."/move farmer -2 0 3/playSound doorClose/warp Wizard 5 27 2/speak Wizard "Esmerelda! $1"/faceDirection Witch 0/emote Witch 16/speak Witch "Rasmodius!$3"/move Wizard 0 10 2/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection Witch 3/speak Witch "What are you doing here? "/speak Wizard "I was going to ask you the same question since you're in front of my tower."/speak Witch "...$2 #$b# I came here to tell you I'm sorry."/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Wizard "What are you sorry for?"/speak Witch "For when I lashed out at you right after the divorce. #$b# All of the cursing and anger I let out on you. #$b# I didn't know how to handle the situation, so my emotions took over. #$b# I'm sorry for everything Rasmodius."/speak Wizard "I wanted to say sorry as well. #$b# For all the pain I caused you. I know what I did to you was wrong. #$b# You don't have to forgive me but I forgive you."/speak Wizard "I'll get out of your hair now."/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/screenFlash 1/pause 3000/speak Witch "All I wanted to hear from him was sorry. #$b# After all of these years..."/faceDirection Witch 1/speak Witch " Thank you @, for everything you've done.$1 #$b# You're really special don't forget that!$1"/emote farmer 20/end
